result.title: Ethics Plan
result.description: The Ethics Plan will contain the procedures to be followed by all the participants. In particular, for the ARUs:: 1) Issues on data collection. 2) Interviews. 3) Informed consent. 4) Anonymity of interviewed people. 5) Compensation to participants. 6) Gender perspective 7) Multi-functional teams. 8) Regular participatory assessments with representatives of all target groups. 9) Multi-perspective analysis.

result.title: Final report on dissemination, standardisation and exploitation planning
result.description:
This deliverable will present the 2-IMMERSE innovation barometer and will report on all dissemination, communication and standardisation actions performed during the project. It will give recommendations for future standardisation contributions. The document will include the final exploitation plan.
*Although public (PU), these deliverables WP6 deliverables will contain a confidential (CO) annex for business-critical matters if required (e.g. concrete exploitation plans)
